name: Processing priority
description: HL7 Standard Tables - Tables defined by the HL7 organization. Most tables in this category are related to the standard and its message structures.

values.description: As soon as possible (a priority lower than stat)
Do at bedside or portable (may be used with other codes)
Measure continuously (e.g., arterial line blood pressure)
Preoperative (to be done prior to surgery)
Timing critical (do as near as possible to requested time)
